messages.content: [Product Release Video] Generate a 60 second storyboard

I'm sorry, but I do not see an uploaded file or specific product details in your message. To create a tailored 60-second Product Release Video storyboard without placeholders, I need the product name, its main features, and the industry or context.

If you provide the product name or a brief description, I can search the web and generate a detailed storyboard. Please upload your file or share the product details, and I’ll deliver a complete storyboard immediately.
The product in Twilio, the feature is called rich context service allowing multiple channels of communication

[
  {
    "screen_number": 1,
    "voiceover_text": "Meet Twilio’s Rich Context Service, the new way to deliver seamless, personalized conversations across every channel.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Twilio logo animation, modern UI, vibrant brand colors, animated chat bubbles connecting across channels",
    "action_notes": "Logo animates in, chat bubbles move between icons for SMS, WhatsApp, Voice, Webchat, Email"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 2,
    "voiceover_text": "Today’s customers expect to connect on their terms—SMS, WhatsApp, voice, and more.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "People using smartphones, laptops, and tablets; switching between messaging apps, phone calls, and web chat",
    "action_notes": "Montage of users communicating on different devices and channels"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 3,
    "voiceover_text": "But context gets lost when conversations jump between channels, leading to frustration and inefficiency.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Customer repeating info to support agent, agent switching screens, confused expressions",
    "action_notes": "Quick cuts showing customer and agent frustration"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 4,
    "voiceover_text": "Twilio’s Rich Context Service keeps every interaction connected—no matter where the conversation starts or ends.",
    "target_duration_sec": 10,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Twilio dashboard, unified conversation timeline, customer profile with history from SMS, WhatsApp, voice, and web chat",
    "action_notes": "Cursor highlights unified timeline, context cards update in real time"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 5,
    "voiceover_text": "Agents see the full conversation history and customer details instantly, so they can deliver fast, personalized support.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Agent dashboard, customer profile, quick response templates, satisfaction icons",
    "action_notes": "Agent clicks on a customer, sees full context, sends a quick, relevant reply"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 6,
    "voiceover_text": "No more repeated questions. No more lost context. Just smooth, connected experiences—every time.",
    "target_duration_sec": 9,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Happy customer and agent, seamless chat flow, checkmarks, positive feedback icons",
    "action_notes": "Before/after split: confusion vs. satisfaction"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 7,
    "voiceover_text": "Transform your customer communications with Twilio’s Rich Context Service. Visit twilio.com to get started.",
    "target_duration_sec": 10,
    "screen_type": "cta",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Twilio logo, website URL, animated CTA button, brand colors, multi-channel icons",
    "action_notes": "Website and CTA animate in, logo holds at end"
  }
]
